name: The Shadow Cat
description:
In this platform game, players will become a black cat, using its ability to hide in shadows to traverse traps and enemies and find the treasure in the castle.

Features

  • Challenges presented by 20 levels.
  • 5 types of unique enemies, observe and master their characteristics for a smoother adventure.
  • After successfully completing all levels, seek the hidden items in the castle.

Enemy Characters

  • Orc
    Easily startled, losing the ability to move instantly when scared.
  • Ghost
    Can possess anyone it touches, be careful of being taken to a strange world.
  • Shadow Spirit
    Exists only in the shadows, very territorial. According to rumors, for ghosts, Shadow Spirits are a delicious delicacy.

Play Time

60 ~ 90 minutes
